text: Tony Knowles may refer to: * Tony Knowles (politician) (born 1943), former governor of the U.S. state of Alaska * Tony Knowles (snooker player) (born 1955), English snooker player * Tony Knowles (chemist), former President, British Columbia Institute of Technology ==See also== * Tony Knowles Coastal Trail, a bike trail in Anchorage, Alaska named for the American politician
title: Tony Knowles
